name: Strawberry Jumper
description:
Strawberry Jumper is a platformer where you have to avoid traps, collect strawberries and reach the end. 

There are 3 levels:

Level 1: Easy

Level 2: Medium

Level 3: Hard

Complete all levels and beat the game as fast as posible.

Avoid traps, reach the finish line and collect strawberries along the way.

Ride platforms to reach new places.

Jump on trampolines and avoid getting cut in half by saws.

And finish the game.
